channel.title: Okay I changed the rights
channel.description: Okay well I want to make it so new players that join, can start off picking up items. I searched pickup in client.java and changed the rights to 0, and compiled. Still wont work? I searched pickup throughout the client.java and found nothing that i can changed rights, any ideas?

item.title: Okay I changed the rights

item.description:

No offense pilldom, Why dontcha add their command to your server, see how many errors you get.
LOL.

item.title: Okay I changed the rights
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

[quote=“b1g th13f, post:6, topic:195776”]I take it your using a czar based server, LOL
Kay, Then your’s should look like this —> else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deesh696969") || playerRights >= 1)) {

Make it look like this —> else if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {[/quote]

Two people have already posted and said the exact same thing. Look to make sure its not there already or its pretty much just spam…

Read full topic

item.title: Okay I changed the rights

I take it your using a czar based server, LOL
Kay, Then your’s should look like this —> else if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("deesh696969") || playerRights >= 1)) {

item.title: Okay I changed the rights
item.dc:creator: @jacobhankal jacobhankal
item.description:
@jacobhankal wrote:

go into client .java and search pickup until you find something that looks like

 if (command.startsWith("pickup") && playerRights >= 2)

delete the && playerRights >= 2)

then it should look like command.startsWith("pickup")

Read full topic
